description.value: When a Project is created & associated with a Task Type that has a defined templated, the template steps should drive creation of the Tasks & Approvals for that template
description.display_value: When a Project is created & associated with a Task Type that has a defined templated, the template steps should drive creation of the Tasks & Approvals for that template
